sentences.en: ‘Are you lost?’ the driver asked.
sentences.cn: “你迷路了吗？”司机问道。

sentences.en: a lost child
sentences.cn: 一个走失的孩子

sentences.en: During fever a large quantity of fluid is lost in perspiration.
sentences.cn: 发烧时，大量水分会通过排汗而丧失。

sentences.en: Friendship means understanding, not agreement. It means forgiveness, not forgetting.It means the memories last, even if contact is lost.
sentences.cn: 友情是理解，不是妥协；是原谅，不是遗忘。即使不联系，感情依然在。

sentences.en: He lost a foot when he was struck by a train.
sentences.cn: 他给火车撞伤，失去了一只脚。

sentences.en: He lost two stone in weight during his time there.
sentences.cn: 他在那儿的时候体重下降了2英石。

sentences.en: He was lost in the con-templation of the landscape for a while.
sentences.cn: 有一会儿，他怔怔地注视着周围的景物。

sentences.en: He was so drunk that he had lost the power of speech.
sentences.cn: 他醉得太厉害，连话都说不出来了。

sentences.en: I got thoroughly lost on the way here.
sentences.cn: 我来这里时完全迷了路。

sentences.en: It beats me how she found her lost ring .
sentences.cn: 我难以理解她怎么能找到她那遗失的戒指。

sentences.en: It infected them with some of the magic of a lost age.
sentences.cn: 逝去的岁月让他们平添了几分魅力。

sentences.en: It's a game that has really lost its allure.
sentences.cn: 这是一项的确已失去了魅力的游戏。

sentences.en: My son has suffered terribly. He has lost his best friend.
sentences.cn: 我儿子遭受了巨大痛苦，他失去了最要好的朋友。

sentences.en: Sampdoria lost their unbeaten record with a 2-1 home defeat against Genoa.
sentences.cn: 桑普多利亚队主场1比2负于热那亚队之后，终止了自己的不败纪录。

sentences.en: She lost her head and started screaming at me.
sentences.cn: 她惊慌失措，开始向我大声尖叫。

sentences.en: She still ached for the lost intimacy and sexual contact of marriage.
sentences.cn: 她仍旧渴望拥有婚姻中逝去的那份缱绻和肌肤之亲。

sentences.en: The armed forces have launched offensives to recapture lost ground.
sentences.cn: 这支武装部队已发动进攻要夺回失去的阵地。

sentences.en: the significance of his remarks was not lost on Scott.
sentences.cn: 斯科特听懂了他的话的含义。

sentences.en: The victim suffered a dreadful injury and lost a lot of blood.
sentences.cn: 受害者受了重伤，大量失血。

sentences.en: They have chased down all possible clues but cannot find the lost girl.
sentences.cn: 他们已经找遍了一切可能的线索，但仍未找到这个遗失的女孩。

sentences.en: two boys searching for a lost ball
sentences.cn: 在寻找一个丢失的球的两个男孩

sentences.en: We have lost everything, but thank God, our lives have been spared.
sentences.cn: 我们已经失去了一切，不过谢天谢地，总算是保住了性命。

sentences.en: Why don't you leave me alone? Go on, get lost!.
sentences.cn: 让我自己呆一会行吗？快点走开！。

words.tran_cn: 浪费；使沉溺于；使迷路；遗失；错过

phrases.tran_cn: 因非常惊讶（或迷惑、失望）而不知该说些什么
[口语]因缺少某物而不舒服，因缺少某物而无法愉快地生活
(非正式)[经常用祈使语气表示恼怒或没耐心]走开，别来烦我
不再（对失踪的人）抱生还的希望
注定要失败的努力（或行动）
浪费时间；失去时机；延误
赶进度，补回损失的时间

trans.tran_cn: 失去的，迷路的，不知所措的
trans.tran_en: if you are lost, you do not know where you are and are unable to find your way somewhere
if something is lost, you had it but cannot now find

trans.tran_cn: 遗失，失去，（使）失去（所需要的东西，尤指钱），失败，浪费（ lose的过去式和过去分词）
